quotes_database.description: 200+ motivational quotes organized by categories and moods. Updated without app releases.

fallback_notification_messages.description: Fallback notification messages when AI is unavailable

feature_ai_quotes_enabled.description: Feature flag to enable/disable AI quote generation globally

ai_daily_quota_per_user.description: Number of AI quotes per day per user (default: 5)

cache_ttl_days.description: Cache time-to-live in days for AI-generated quotes (default: 30)

maintenance_mode.description: Enable maintenance mode (disables AI features, shows fallback quotes)

version.description: Initial Remote Config template for Happify 2
